TopicTitle: My heavy lift rocket using stock parts

Articles.Content:
Not bad, now all you need is something to lift up into orbit

You thinking of a space station or extraplanetary travel?
I\'m really new to the game so I\'m not exactly sure what I\'ll end up using it for. Space station would be cool but I haven\'t put any mods onto the game yet.

> 
> I\'m really new to the game so I\'m not exactly sure what I\'ll end up using it for. Space station would be cool but I haven\'t put any mods onto the game yet.

Who says you need mods to make space stations?

Ok I guess you wouldn\'t need mods for a space station but I\'m still working on my first orbital rendezvous. Once I 'master' that I\'ll start thinking about putting something I can visit up there lol.
